item.title: A Shiny web app to find out how much medical procedures cost in your state.
item.description: Today the front page of the Huffington Post featured the Today the front page of the Huffington Post featured the that shows the cost of many popular procedures broken down by hospital. We here at Simply Statistics think you should be able to explore these data more easily.
